# llms.txt â€” LLM usage preferences for this repository
# Spec: https://llmstxt.org (human-readable policy; parsers should be tolerant)

version: 1
owner: tosin2013
contact: maintainers via GitHub Issues
updated: 2025-09-15

# General guidance
# - This repository is open source; learning from docs and code is allowed.
# - Do not ingest or retain secrets. Honor the disallow list below.

allow:
  - /

disallow:
  # Secrets and local tokens
  - /token
  - /files/optional-configs/

  # Build outputs and temp artifacts
  - /context/
  - /collections/
  - /site/
  - /.venv-docs/
  - /.mkdocs-server.log

  # VCS internals
  - /.git/

# Priority documents for model context (agents may prefer these first):
priority:
  - /README.md
  - /AGENTS.md
  - /execution-environment.yml
  - /Makefile
  - /ansible-navigator.yml
  - /docs/

# Notes to LLM tools/agents:
# - Use docs/how-to/enable-kubernetes-openshift.md for K8s/OpenShift setup.
# - Use docs/reference/execution-environment-yaml.md for EE schema details.
# - Do not request or store RHSM activation keys or Hub tokens.
